name: Max-msp-installation
body:
![MAX MSP 5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7969023/10117751/83d8efac-647f-11e5-8a86-3e125e37b394.jpg)
### MAX MSP
Get access to your very own MAX MSP software without having to pay anything. Features of this intallation would also include allowing you to save your projects.

### Instructions
Installation Notes: 

On 32-bit versions of Windows:
 - Just run Max5.msi
 - Reboot

On 64-bit versions of windows:
 - Run "PACE Drivers x64.exe" (Not necessary if you have it already by ProTools HD 10.3.5 or others)
 - Run Max5.msi
 - Reboot


Do not forget to overwrite the original files with the ones from (Lz0 Folder)

    Known issue with this release of MAX :
    You cannot overwrite a project save if it has the same name,
    CAUTION WHILE YOU CLOSE THE PROJECT, SAVE CHANGES DOESNT WORK, IT WONT BE SAVED THAT WAY.

*So just rename it (save as) ! (Or it will throw you a jpatcher_saveto: error -1 shit)*

### Disclaimer
    This content is neither supported or endorsed by `kaustubhcs`. 
    Please be careful with what you do with your system
![MAX MSP 5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7969023/10117752/83dfcee4-647f-11e5-96bb-f741e61a365f.png)
### Happy Coding
![MAX MSP 5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7969023/10117750/83a165be-647f-11e5-9b15-7a0437b1f0f8.png)
